articles.content: NEW YORK The Yankees have spoken with teams about trading struggling outfielder Joey Gallo, and they have been targeting smaller markets in the belief that Gallo could turn himself around in a city w… [+1662 chars]

articles.author: Jeremy Cluff, The Arizona Republic
articles.title: Pac-12 'fractured' by Big Ten, Big 12 conference realignment, expansion - The Arizona Republic
articles.description: The Pac-12 has been 'fractured' over college realignment, according to one insider, and Arizona and ASU could be on different sides of the divide.
articles.content: Earlier this month, Arizona State athletic director Ray Anderson told The Arizona Republic that the remaining 10 teams in the Pac-12 conference were "united" after USC and UCLA's decision to leave fo… [+7661 chars]
